{{Lang|'''Ivano'''|ru=Ивано|ru_rm=Ivano}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in the {{Quest|Undetected Infiltration}}.

==Profile==
Ivano is a [[Fatui]] soldier in [[The Chasm (Area)|The Chasm]]. He and a fellow soldier, a [[Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage]], were sent to strike a trade deal for food with a group of [[Treasure Hoarders]] in the [[Lumberpick Valley]], led by [[Brass Bull Zhao]] and [[Chen the Flower]]. However, the deal was interrupted by the [[Traveler]], who was assisting the [[Millelith]] in stopping the Treasure Hoarders' illegal activities, and Ivano and his comrade were defeated alongside the Treasure Hoarders.

===Appearance===
Ivano takes the form of a [[Fatui Pyro Agent]].<!--Note: There's no in-game indication that this one is Ivano, but given the fact that Ivano is generally a male name, this is the more likely conclusion-->
